apihelp-wbsgetschemarecommendation-descr: API module for getting suggestions of additional properties to add to a Wikibase entity. The API module is primarily intended for use by the suggester widget when users are editing Wikibase entities.
apihelp-wbsgetschemarecommendation-summa: API module for getting suggestions of additional properties to add to a Wikibase entity. The API module is primarily intended for use by the suggester widget when users are editing Wikibase entities.
apihelp-wbsgetschemarecommendation-examp: Get suggestions for entity Q4 from rank 10 to 15
Get suggestions for the property combination P21 and P31
Get suggestions for the qualifiers that are used with P21
Get suggestions for the references that are used with P21
apihelp-wbsgetschemarecommendation-param: Offset where to continue a search.
Suggest properties for the given entity, based on existing list of properties that the entity has.
Which suggestions to include: Per default only properties that might be added (non-deprecated, not yet present) will be suggested.
Suggest additional properties for the given list of properties.
Specify number of suggestions to be returned.
